Topic: Platform Permission Model Testing (Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > 008_Application Security > 008_006_Application Security Testing Tools > Mobile 008_006 MAST > Mobile Platform Security Analysis > Platform Permission Model Testing). Mobile: Android (permissions.xml, runtime), iOS (entitlements, sandbox). Testing: Drozer (Android dynamic), MobSF (static/dynamic), ADB/Frida. Standards: NIST 800-53 Rev5 AC family (AC-2/3/6), 800-53A procedures; OWASP MASVS. Best practices: Verify enforcement, simulate escalation, integrate CI/CD. Use these exact learning objectives [insert learning_objectives array]. Embed active learning [insert active_learning object] as contextual hooks. Follow scaffolding layers [insert scaffolding_layers array] for progressive coverage. Generate 50-75 high-quality flashcards per the schema [insert flashcard_generation_schema]. Ensure: - Prior knowledge links: Build on authentication/access control from Domains 001-002. - Voter priorities: Completeness (full NIST/OWASP), pedagogy (Bloom's, interactive), scaffolding (4 layers), concept map ties. - Variety: Cover all Bloom's levels/layers; include mobile tools/exercises. - Output format: JSON array of objects, each with 'front', 'back' (nested as specified), 'card_type' (e.g., 'MCQ', 'Definition'). No extras.
